title: Publish current draft to production

requirements.text: Publish (deploy) the currently built draft version of the application to production so the live app reflects the latest draft state.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is triggered from the current draft build.
After deployment completes, the production app is accessible and reflects the same behavior/content as the latest draft.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not implement new features or modify application code/content beyond what is already in the current draft.
Do not change Stripe configuration, authentication, or pricing logic as part of publishing.
